Package Model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Model.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy
public class Player extends Object
Represents the player character in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name, int x, int y, int height, int width, Inventory inventory)
      Constructs a player character with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player
      x - the initial x-coordinate of the player
      y - the initial y-coordinate of the player
      height - the height of the player
      width - the width of the player
      inventory - the inventory of the player
